issue.title: [JS] Table.fromStruct missing from externs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2327](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2327). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`Table.fromStruct` is not listed in externs, so its obfuscated by the closure compiler

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2327?focusedCommentId=16419914) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1808
